thread.title: Lydia T

author: Lydia T
title: Lydia T
text: Needed two new front tyres due to nails embedded in them. Arranged the two hour slot as have a baby and toddler at home. Tony called me to check I was available and advised he was ten minutes away. He was very friendly and professional and explained what he was going to do and I was able to leave him to get on with the tyre replacement whilst I stayed in house with kids. When he had finished he talked through what he had done and only got me to sign once I confirmed I was content with the work. Really pleased with the service!
